lead_data.name: Raj
lead_data.need: Need information for Razorpay for online business
pain_points: Customers are unable to pay online fast or easily.

follow_up_email.subject: Confirmation: Demo scheduled for 2024-11-27
follow_up_email.body:
Hi Raj,

Thank you for speaking with me today! I enjoyed learning about Brotherhood company's payment solutions needs.


✅ DEMO CONFIRMED
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Date: 2024-11-27
Time: 9:00 AM
Duration: 30 minutes
Type: Demo
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━


🎯 Challenges You Mentioned:
• Customers are unable to pay online fast or easily.


💡 How We'll Help:
We'll demonstrate how to increase your conversion rates by 40% and recover lost revenue with our seamless checkout flow and global payment methods.


📋 What We'll Cover in Demo:
• Easy
• user-friendly payment UI
• payment options for customer orders.


I've prepared a customized demo specifically for payment solutions. We'll address each of your challenges and show you exactly how Razorpay can help.

Looking forward to our conversation!

Best regards,
Priya
Sales Development Representative
Razorpay
